heading: Season 1 Announcement Developer Livestream July 6th at 11AM PDT
content: , Adam Fletcher, Joseph Piepiora and Timothy Ismay will announce Season 1 of Diablo 4 along with incoming quality-of-life updates. Players will also have the opportunity to ask the developers questions during a live Q&A session at the end of the livestream! Following the conclusion of the livestream, we'll make a full post going over the topics and details coming for Season 1!

heading: Wave 1 of BlizzCon Tickets on Sale July 8th, 10am PDT
content: Following the conclusion of the livestream, we'll make a full post going over the topics and details coming for Season 1!
